lines.speaker: Kana
lines.dialogue: A lot of the people in the upper class are real jerks.

lines.speaker: Kana
lines.dialogue: Well, obviously, but it’s worse than you think! They quite literally use people for their own gain and pleasure.

lines.speaker: Me
lines.dialogue: I’d say you had it pretty good, livingIn some pristine tower.

lines.speaker: Me
lines.dialogue: People like me and those poor souls in the factory actually have to work.
